short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Croner-i tax, audit and accounting content whilst in Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View your Croner-i Navigate content alongside your results from Google with the powerful NavigateMe Google integration tool.
 
NavigateMe will revolutionise the way our clients perform their tax and accounting research. We understand that some Croner-i Navigate users use Google as their first port of call for researching online. Thatâ€™s why we have developed NavigateMe, a new powerful tool that enables users to view their search results from Croner-i Navigate alongside their Google search results. Your Croner-i Navigate search results are now just a click away, even when searching in Google, youâ€™ll get your answers quicker than ever!

When in the Chrome browser, start your search with the term â€œNavigateMeâ€ and the term you wish to search for. A search in Croner-i Navigate will be immediately performed for you in a new window.
 
Croner-i is dedicated to continuously advancing the Croner-i Navigate platform and NavigateMe to meet the evolving needs of professionals now, and as the industry changes.
 
A valid Croner-i Navigate subscription and credentials are required. If youâ€™d like to find out more about Croner-i and how we can help your business, please telephone 0800 231 5199 or visit www.croneri.co.uk/demo.
